posts.bodyText: browsed lots of websites today. played a cool game called MROI_. i need to fix my website. art is hard. DX friday. exams all next week.

posts.bodyText: i was up so ungodly late thank goodness i didnt have a stat quiz today. i am full of joy and happyness and everything was beautiful and nothing hurt
DX IS TODAY. MY HEART IS FULL OF JOY. i am so. tired. was up far too late. again. oops. HOWEVER IT IS SO OK LIFE IS GOODO
oh it was so much fun. however. this week is gonna be so brutal. spent 1000 years working on this website and 0 hw done!!
